You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE
Product Detail

Manage settings for the user experience and performance of the Product Detail page. The Product Detail module's API name is pd.

Blocked Product User Types
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	pd.prvallut
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Semi-colon-separated list of user types that can view products on the storefront where the product status is In Creation or Blocked.
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Cache
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	pd.cache
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Enable Caching for Storefront Pages
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Dynamic Kit Flow Enabled
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	pd.dispdkflow
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Show All Dynamic Kit Options in a Flow Experience
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Go To Cart
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	pd.g2c
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Configure Product Info and Options on the Product Detail Page
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Show Add To Cart
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	pd.dspladdcart
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Configure Product Info and Options on the Product Detail Page
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Show Availability
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	pd.dsplavlb
Externally Safe?	
Usage	
Manage Product Inventory Items and Availability Messages
Configure Product Info and Options on the Product Detail Page

Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Show List Price
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	pd.dspllistprc
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Configure Product Info and Options on the Product Detail Page
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Show Pricing
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	pd.dsplprc
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Configure Product Info and Options on the Product Detail Page
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Show Savings
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	pd.dsplsvprc
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Configure Product Info and Options on the Product Detail Page
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Show Short Description
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	pd.dsplsdesc
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Configure Product Info and Options on the Product Detail Page
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Show SKU
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	pd.dsplsku
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Configure Product Info and Options on the Product Detail Page
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Show Type
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	pd.dspltype
Externally Safe?	
Usage	This configuration is deprecated and doesn't apply to any current functionality.
Compatibility	None
Show Unit of Measure
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	pd.dspluom
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Configure Product Info and Options on the Product Detail Page
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Tier Pricing as Page Section
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	pd.tiersassec
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Display tiered pricing information in a configurable page section on the Product Detail page. Possible values are TRUE or FALSE. To display tiered pricing information inline with other product details, use FALSE.
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
Tier Pricing Overflow Count
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	pd.tierovflco
Externally Safe?	
Usage	An integer that specifies the number of tiered pricing boxes to display on the Product Detail page. Any additional boxes are hidden on the page.
Compatibility	B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) or later
DID THIS ARTICLE SOLVE YOUR ISSUE?
Let us know so we can improve!
Yes
No
title: Configuring Product Detail Page Settings in Salesforce B2B Commerce
